title: Analyze Soil Electrical Conductivity (EC) Map
description: A farmer has an EC map of their field and wants to use it to understand variations in soil texture.

tasks.description: Retrieve the soil EC map for the specified field.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the EC map data.

tasks.description: Interpret the EC map, explaining that high EC values typically correlate with heavier, clay soils, and low EC values with lighter, sandy soils.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a correct interpretation of the EC data.

tasks.description: Create management zones based on the EC data that correspond to different soil textures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a map showing zones of clay, loam, and sand.
